long_description: The Timex Ironman 30-lap digital watch for women has Ironman-ready features built into Ironman-worthy construction. Features 100 hr. chronograph with lap or split option; 30-lap memory recall; 24-hr. countdown timer with stop and repeat capabilities. Includes 2 time zones and daily/weekday/weekend alarm with 5 min. backup. Includes 99-lap counter, forward/backward setting and built-in setting reminders. Features INDIGLO(R) All Day display and Night-Light; Night-Mode(R) activates lighting with the push of any button. Oversize digits are easily readable at a glance, even while you're running. Soft polyurethane strap and resin construction provide comfort and durability. The Timex Ironman 30-lap digital watch is water resistant to 100m (330 ft).
short_description: The Timex Ironman 30-lap digital watch for women has Ironman-ready features built into Ironman-worthy construction.
